description: Creates a new updated WorkSpace image based on the specified source image. The new updated WorkSpace image has the latest drivers and other updates required by the Amazon WorkSpaces components. To determine which WorkSpace images need to be updated with the latest Amazon WorkSpaces requirements, use DescribeWorkspaceImages.

parameters.name: Name
parameters.description: The name of the new updated WorkSpace image.

parameters.name: Description
parameters.description: A description of whether updates for the WorkSpace image are available.

parameters.name: SourceImageId
parameters.description: The identifier of the source WorkSpace image.

parameters.name: Tags
parameters.description: The tags that you want to add to the new updated WorkSpace image. (dict) --- Describes a tag. The key of the tag. Value (string) --- The value of the tag.

nested_items.name: ImageId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the new updated WorkSpace image.
